lender.name: yuki
lender.loan_because: I wanna help someone who has responsibility of business. I think, ignoring demand of them is really MOTTAI-NAI. Kiva has possibility of changing. That's why I do.

lender.name: anton
lender.loan_because: it is about time to get going
lender.occupational_info: we build the background to a dream to be seen in the cinema.

lender.name: Dan West
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: Currently studying economics at the University.

lender.name: John Cappello
lender.loan_because: I can ;-)

lender.name: Jakob Sandgren
lender.loan_because: It is the right (and fun!) thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I own and run the company South Pole AB who sells computer hardware and consulting services.

lender.name: mba envo
lender.loan_because: I believe micro loans are the path up for many people. I have seen the research from India and I know this concept works.
lender.occupational_info: I work primarily with, children, primarily impoverished and also with mentally ill people in Boston. I also work on a project in Haiti once a year.

lender.name: Maglo
lender.loan_because: "The stone that the builder refuse...will always be the headcorner stone..." (Bob Marley) I'm not a builder and I'm not a refused stone too!...but I think that my stone will be useful to build a better future. This is a little stone for the moment but I'm proud of it!!!!
lender.occupational_info: Difficult but we have no choice...Some people turns their dreams into their work...I try to turn my work into a dream!...

lender.name: Carter
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together...

lender.name: Märta
lender.loan_because: I belive in the good and wonderful in every person. Together, we've created this world, and together should we develop it! good luck to all you brave entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Doug M. INDIANA, USA
lender.loan_because: It cuts out the middle man (ie. Governments which are the most inefficient part of loans.. And, because most of the people on Kiva pay back because they get what they need.

lender.name: Elizabeth and Dewey
lender.loan_because: I am making loans in support of President Obama's inaugural next week and in support of Michelle Obama's request that we all do something to honor the day.

lender.name: rshudo
lender.loan_because: I want to give the chance to a diligent person.
lender.occupational_info: I have been maintaining the server system for four years.

lender.name: Merete
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help!

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: Convinced that contributing to micro loans individuals can have a direct impact on the future of others while sharing the risk among others
lender.occupational_info: Making businesses more profitable and stable for tomorrows challenges.

lender.name: Alberto
lender.loan_because: The world needs money moving around from the rich countries to the poor ones to create prosperity, and therefore a more just and peaceful world. If every single person from a first world country transferred 25$ to the rest of the world, the change in a few years would be astonishing. And many people can lend more than just 25$.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Someone asked me to and I want to learn more about this opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I think of ways to sell more ham. I work for a company that makes the worlds best ham - The HoneyBaked Ham

lender.name: susanna
lender.loan_because: E' giusto che chi sta bene aiuta chi ha bisogno. E' semplicemente amore per il prossimo.

lender.name: Larry and Joyce
lender.loan_because: Both my wife and I, coming from modest circumstances, received help from the kindness of strangers in obtaining our college degrees. We have a sense of obligation to share our good fortune with those who need a 'helping hand'. The light of one candle is not diminished by lighting another.
lender.occupational_info: I am a clinical microbiologist who oversees an infectious diseases diagnostic laboratory in a large regional trauma center and teaching hospital. The mission of my hospital is to provide health care to those who cannot afford the high cost of medical care in the United States in general and California in particular. My hospital, in essence, is a 'mercy' hospital providing health care to poor people in northern California as well as visitors and immigrants from all corners of the world regardless of ability to pay.

lender.name: Perkins Realty Group
lender.loan_because: Giving back is important to building stable communities. Stable communities improve the quality of life for us all.

lender.name: Jeff Chung
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur, I'm hoping to be able to contribute to a cause that will allow those with less resources to pursue similar dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Licensed General Contractor who focuses on environmentally friendly solutions like energy efficient lighting systems.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have a good job and the ability to share that which I earn. It is a small way I can offer someone else a chance to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to help educators become better educators.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: We live in a global village and we all should help others however we can.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect roads, culverts, ditches, bridges, fences, etc for the local government and recommend what repairs should be done.

lender.name: Alina
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the most human gesture.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: like to help those less fortunate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I help mentally disabled people live in their own place in the community

lender.name: Ivan & Stjepan
lender.occupational_info: Sitting in front of a computer, working for banks.

lender.name: Sandra & Susan
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to have what we have and want to help others.

lender.name: ameir
lender.loan_because: it is the best way to alleviate poverty and preserve dignity at the same time

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I've had my own business and know the importance of relying on others when needed in order to make my business grow!
lender.occupational_info: I help make electronic games for adults and children.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: Global wealth = global peace.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: In an ever-more globalized world, helping people is easy. I especially like helping those involved with agriculture.... just trying to help those who have to compete against corporate monopolies who control huge portions of world markets, putting small local farmers out of business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Northeastern University in Boston, MA. I'm a Public Advocacy and Rhetoric Communications major, International Affairs minor, and interested in international food policy and economics, fair trade, and microfinance.

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro credit
lender.occupational_info: entertainment entrepreneur

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: People need a chance to better their own lives, not just a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I determine which projects my employer to take on based on the potential financial benefit.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand to some less-priviledged women out there.
lender.occupational_info: Pediatric psychiatric and oncology nursing.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: We all need a hand sometimes

lender.name: Frank and Jan
lender.loan_because: It enables us to give others an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Frank was an engineer and Jan worked as a nurse for many years. We now spend time enjoying our grandchildren.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: helping people find their way through loss

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: I want ot understand

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my child how to be a active participant in the world.

lender.name: The Huster Family
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I prefer to help people who want a hand up as opposed to a handout.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Jesus would be a Kiva fan.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at Toccoa Falls College to work wherever needs are found.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I loan becasue i think that micro-financing is very genius. I wanna help people who need something more than i could ever need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student who is seeking to working full-time with the Christian and Missionary Alliance.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It is important to me that I share what I can, when I can with those who may not be as fortunate as I have been.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We can all use a little help sometimes.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: toughest job in the world!

lender.name: Vebol
lender.loan_because: I want to have an impact on the world, no matter how small.

lender.name: Burr
lender.loan_because: I believe in captialism and helping those that want to improve their status through hard work and effort.
lender.occupational_info: I was an accountant that worked for companies on their property taxes.

lender.name: holliday
lender.occupation: International Business Development for food aid

lender.name: Leah
lender.occupation: Director of Student Activities at a University
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I plan events for college students on our campus.

lender.name: abdulla
lender.loan_because: i love KIVA

lender.name: Gilles
lender.occupational_info: To define what is critical for customers when buying new cars

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone make their way in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I sing and play guitar and mandolin for church services and for the elderly in nursing homes.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: There is so much to do.

lender.name: Redlunarskywalker
lender.occupational_info: For now i don't know what i should do for the kiva community.What purpose does this have and if i can do my type of work here...

lender.name: Tom Main
lender.loan_because: It was a great gift Idea from my daughter Alysha...........I love the idea and would like to help farmers as I live and grew up on a farm.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large manufacturer of steel building products (steel roofing) in sales.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to succeed, to live decently, to be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a part-time instructor at a community college. I teach writing, mostly to students who have taken a break from school for a career.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.occupational_info: Working to create an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet as the guiding principle of our times.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a dignified response to global inequity.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: It's a savings account with the ultimate interest.
lender.occupational_info: I made a very good living in the construction business for 30 years, now I am trying to do the same in the Internet business. Wish me luck!

lender.name: Jarred & Kathy & kids
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are grateful.
lender.occupational_info: We make electronic scales for agriculture and industry.

lender.name: Viola
lender.loan_because: it is so easy and has such an impact on others. I love the idea of how much microcredits can change.

lender.name: B1elette
lender.loan_because: Every time lifes is doing good to me, I give something back.
lender.occupational_info: 24/7 number crunching!

lender.name: John & Iona
lender.loan_because: We loan because ordinary atheists can help to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: One of us teaches young people with psychological and behavioural difficulties, the other helps women with high risk pregnancies.

lender.name: Jaison
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of having control to whom my money goes, and the idea of helping the people to support themselves. And I get that money back to lend to someone else!
lender.occupational_info: The old phrase: "Give a person a fish, and they'll feed themselves for a day. Give them a fishing rod, and they'll feed themselves for a lifetime".

lender.name: Steve / Carol
lender.loan_because: My brother -in-law gave us a gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music in a Christian School. My wife is a nurse helping liver transplate patients.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can. I don't believe in god, but I'm good for goodness' sake.

lender.name: Sean & Shanna
lender.loan_because: Our best friends gave us a gift certificate for Christmas so that we could provide a loan for someone in another part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is the Vice President of a valve company. I stay at home & take care of our 2 children and the house. Together we make a great team!

lender.name: John Hayato
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kellie Ann
lender.loan_because: It feels right.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I have something others can use
lender.occupational_info: I help families of sick children get the help they need

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I know it works. I can make a huge impact in someone's life.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupation: Writer, Public Access TV talk show host

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Public Ed. Consultant, Cdn. Mental Health Assoc.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person and I want to give to those who are less fortunate. I want them to have a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. When I was working, I was a teacher of young children, and then an elementary school principal. I am married and have two grown sons. I enjoy playing the viola.

lender.name: Greg & Deanna
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed in our life, and want to use that to bless others.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to get needed funds when you work so hard to achieve your goal.

lender.name: Lyndsey
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with coffee, lots and lots of coffee.

lender.name: www.helenemcintosh.com
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me the donation as a gift for my birthday and I think this is such a good way to help people who don't have the means to develop their entrepreunerial skills on their own.
lender.occupational_info: Although I am retired, I spend a great deal of my time painting - mostly paintings of people. I often give my paintings to raise money for community projects.

lender.name: Gerry
lender.occupational_info: I teach Advanced Placement and International Baccalaureate Psychology. I also coach girls golf.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have some spare savings that aren't doing the rest of the world a lick of good.
lender.occupational_info: I afflict the comfortable and comfort the afflicted.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: it's worth it....and did I mention that it's fun

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and I believe that this model can make a huge impact on the lives of individuals. Giving someone a helping hand is the best thing a person can do... a hand out is not all that helpful in the end.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate; I hope that my loans will help others to feel fortunate too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and a waitress.

lender.name: Tenney
lender.loan_because: I'm Aquarian and that's what we do

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in fair and equal opportunities and that people know their own needs best and because I believe we are all called to treat our neighbors as we would want to be treated by them.
lender.occupational_info: applied statistics, analysis planning, programming, result interpretation, report writing, defense of conclusions

lender.name: Corin,Madeline,Benjamin
lender.loan_because: B(10yo): We want to help people make their dreams come true. M(13yo): We want to help people make their lives better. C(mom): An amount that seems so small to us can make such a big difference to someone else. It's important to appreciate what we have... and to give others the opportunities we would want.
lender.occupational_info: I (the mom) work with families of kids who learn differently. As a family, we learn by participating in the world around us.

lender.name: Jon Roar
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've given the opportunity to do so and with that help others becoming selfemployed like myself. And in turn, making their own future.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and the process of making or changing large computer systems for organizations.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: the ability to empower another in anyway I can is tremendously important to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work as part of Austin EcoNetwork with the goal of connecting environmental sustainabile communities, nonprofits, business, and public sector organizations; increasing collaboration to encourage strong actions toward achieving a sustainable world.

lender.name: William Morris
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a difference in the world, and in the lives of individuals.
lender.occupational_info: A creative director with years of experience in advertising, branding, design, and marketing; with even more years in philanthropic+entrepreneurial ventures in Colombia, the Philippines, and Thailand.

lender.name: Dominika
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student at UBC, studying International Relations and Political Science.

lender.name: Ufuoma
lender.loan_because:
Dear All,
My name is Ufuoma and I am an International student studying law in the United States. I was admitted to the university for the masters program and just completed my first semester. Unfortunately due to a fire my parents lost their home and are unable to continue payment of my tuition fees. My family has attempted to secure loans from banks but this has proved difficult in view of the fact that the only property that could have been used to secure the loan has been destroyed and also because of my residential status in the U.S.
Please help me. Thank you
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Ryan Seashore
lender.loan_because: It's needed! The ability to help someone in another part of the world by making a small donation is incredible.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe one of the best ways (if not he best) to help people in developing countries is by promoting and facilitating/funding their economic development through constructive entrepreneurship (i.e. not speculation-based entrepreneurship). KIVA is the best option I've found so far to try to accomplish this, I'm glad it's being so successful. I only wish there were some Healthcare related projects we could help fund (I haven't seen any yet)... Particularly since I work in this field, and the need for better (or at least 'some') healthcare is huge in those countries. Anyway, a step at a time, and my sincere congratulations to KIVA for the idea and the implementation.

lender.name: Vijay Basrur
lender.loan_because: I think it is a small way of giving back and be thankful for all that I have
lender.occupational_info: I love working for start ups. I truly enjoy creating an organization and watching it grow. Hoping to be an entrepreneur soon

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I do love and care, insha Allah

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a better way to support people in need and make sure the right people get the money without unnecessary administration

lender.name: Tiago
lender.loan_because: it will bring hope to these people. With hope, people will make their lives better. And will pass that hope to others. And so on...

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in direct ways.
lender.occupational_info: I write papers on how technology impacts people and societies around the world. Some of my work then goes on to impact governmental decisions and policy in this area.

lender.name: JohnsFund for Africa
lender.loan_because: I want to give a chance to well motivated people in Africa to start an own business. Why? Because the investment in very small companies is the best multiplicative way to develop growth, employment and income in a poor country - and give people what they need most - jobs. So far I believe in microlending as an individual instrument to make live better in poor countries. And especially Africa needs it ...
lender.occupational_info: as business administrator I help enterprises to grow healthy and to earn money.

lender.name: David & Dasha
lender.loan_because: I love people all over the world and I want to support sustainable business
lender.occupational_info: photographer

lender.name: Zlatko
lender.loan_because: I wanna make a difference

lender.name: Adam
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle Upon Tyne Tyne and Wear
lender.loan_because: I feel that the key to solving many of Africa's problems is to help people who help themselves.

lender.name: Jaakko
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I'm a post-graduate student working on my master's thesis: plenty of reading, writing and studying. In the meantime I do sports and listen to the music and read a lot.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity they may not normally have.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I believe we can help change the world...one step at a time. This forum for lending impacts people's lives dramatically and provides encouragement to lenders and recipients in helping to realize the dreams of so many people so far away.

lender.name: Albie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: My parents use Kiva to teach me about helping others and managing money.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I do research, financial, and administrative work for three professors.

lender.name: Elka
lender.loan_because: Last year, one of my sons introduced our family to Kiva through its gift certificates. I have been very impressed with Kiva, its unique mission and its dedicated staff. I am honored to have been given the opportunity to be an active participant in such a worthwihile proactive world organization.

lender.name: Rick and Lori
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in places of real need.
lender.occupational_info: I (Rick) teach people how to live faithfully in practical ways.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: a little loan goes a long way...

lender.name: Krystal
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much, that I want to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I create posters and fliers to sell groceries, using a computer.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I like to see where my money goes and help people make a success of their lives. I like to lend to co-operatives, women, and ventures that are to do with education.
lender.occupational_info: I work with special needs children to enable them to stay in mainstream education.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe that access to opportunities - like credit - is one of the biggest barriers to getting out of poverty. I also feel comfortable with the way that Kiva operates, since it is incredibly de-centralized, using knowledgable partners at the ground level who learn the needs of individuals and communities rather than making assumptions, or simply dictating donor priorities.
lender.occupational_info: I currently study at the University of Alberta, mainly taking courses relating to politics and the study of the middle east and africa.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I have so much good fortune, I love to spread it around! Especially to the hard working women of the world who are trying to better their lives for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep a radio station running by helping DJ's and also planning events.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: Believe it or not, I grew up in a very poor part of the United States. My family owned a small farm and raised cattle and grew vegitables for a living. I appreciate the work ethic of people like yourselves. I have been very fortunate in my life and I am happy to have the opportunity to help hard working dedicated people live their dreams. Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter / rescue specialist for the city of Seattle. I help people in all kinds of emergency situations. Most of my work involves helping people who are injured in bad accidents. I love my job very much. I am fortunate to be in a profession that employs me to help people.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I think it is important for people with means to offer assistance to those without means. I think most American's can afford $25 every few months, maybe even more.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers and help people solve problems they have with their computers

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I have 5 children & 8 grandchildren and hope this is a way of helping women establish better living conditions for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I assisted families with children who were born with disabilities, mental or physical, to obtain services for their child.

lender.name: Dambar B. Katwal
lender.loan_because: To uphold our ancient and proud tradition of helping people in need.

lender.name: Shelagh
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who otherwise might have no opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy dragon boat racing and travelling.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: We as a family group of sisters & brothers chose to lend to Kiva instead of exchanging Christmas gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I look after the record keeping of business for people.

lender.name: CARLA FIUZA
lender.loan_because: I believe in people
lender.occupational_info: It works, it makes a diference. And make me a better preson

lender.name: Molyka
lender.loan_because: giving back is important no matter small or large the amount may be.

lender.name: Shantel
lender.loan_because: Its a small difference I can make in somebodys life.
lender.occupational_info: Import

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an effective global poverty reduction strategy.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: In a world of profit before people, where we feel we can do little to make an impact, micro-finance helps where it counts, people to people, and people before profit.
lender.occupational_info:
For a job I navigate and run the deck department of ships. This job has let me meet some wonderfull people across the world.
As a hobby I run irishsurfer.com and worldsurfradio.com, a website and a podcast, to give something back to surfing - which has given so much to me.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I am part of a group known as 'The Carpenteros and Friends' who have been involved in supporting micro-financing in Honduras and El Salvador since 2002. Much of the work we do is through the Christian Reformed World Relief Committee and its Latin American partner agencies. I have personally seen the positive impact of just a small loan, and I have developed a deep appreciation for the honesty, commitment and work-ethic of the loan beneficiaries. As a result of micro-lending, I have been assisting coffee growers in Honduras to export 'direct trade' coffee to Canada. This is exceptionally good coffee, and you can learn more or contact us to place an order, by visiting www.carpenteros.ca
lender.occupational_info: I am a Volunteer Coordinator for ServiceLink, an agency of the Christian Reformed Church in North America. My role is to assist individuals and teams to find meaningful serving/learning opportunities, and to assist various ministries and agencies to find suitable volunteers.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, and Kiva puts that within reach. Even a small contribution can make a difference in the lives of men and women in developing countries. When it's this easy to play a role in improving someone's life, there is no reason not to do it.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do to help others when we are able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I buy books and other material for lending in libraries.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world!
lender.occupational_info: I teach flute boys and girls to play the flute, a musical instrument. I teach them how to read music. I also play the flute professionally.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: a smile is a great ROI
lender.occupational_info: I find talented individuals to join our company

lender.name: Scott and Louisa
lender.loan_because: We want to help those people who are willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I run a medical staff training business in Tasmania, Australia.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Tax and Financial Engineering Firm Consultant
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of everyone doing as much as they can to help each other, ultimately making this a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant with a firm that helps people plan their retirement income.

lender.name: Cat Lady
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: Lending what is a relatively small sum for me can make a huge change in the lives of others. It's a positive action!
lender.occupational_info: The preservation of images for use by teachers in the classroom.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I start by helping one person at a time.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: I can help others be independent
lender.occupational_info: I work as a hospital pharmacist on surgical and care of the elderly wards and also as a photographer.

lender.name: Julie Kelly
lender.loan_because: if i can help, i will.

lender.name: Jackie and Sean
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner, and Sean is a electrician with hopes to open his own electrical company. It's a dream I'd love to help someone make true, sometimes all you need is a little help. I want to pay it forward with the help I received to get my business up and running.
lender.occupational_info: I own a commercial and residential cleaning company. It just makes life that much easier for busy homeowners, creating more time for family and self. Sean does electrical work and is currently in school as a 2nd year apprentice.

lender.name: Chevl66
lender.loan_because: it just makes sense

lender.name: Elana
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Self-employed!!

lender.name: Kenjii
lender.loan_because: KIVA is the best life-changing medium to assist entrepreneurs out there who could make a difference in their lives and people surrounding them.
lender.occupational_info: Value-added vocational training in the area of Information Communications Technology and Computer Graphics.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: what little I have can make a huge difference when given to people with even less
lender.occupational_info: I support the business side of the arts

lender.name: The Helping Hands
lender.loan_because: I would like to see the diminution of poverty, diseases, hunger and homelessness in my community and the World around. I believe in the vision that if we all lend helping hands together, we can bring hope and brighter future for those in need here and abroad. I am interested in seeing those striving in business to succeed here in the United States and around the world; not only for themselves but for their communities. By providing help and or assistance to these business minded individuals means we are steps from moving families out of poverty to independent living.
